title: 80s80s MixPlayer
description:
80s80s MixPlayer is a simple music stream player for "80s80s In The Mix" (https://www.80s80s.de/80s80s-in-the-mix). A well known german 80s music player.

The UI is simple. The official image and logo as well as a Spectrum analyzer.
If by chance there's a loss of internet connection, the app tries reconnecting 5 times with a gap of 10 seconds. If that fails you have to manually press O on the OUYA-controller to start again.

Speaking of buttons: O = play/pause and A = quit the app
